description:
Welcome to Hotel California - a charming maisonette set over two floors, boasting 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. This lovely property offers the perfect blend of space and modern convenience.

Located close to the vibrant Main Street, this maisonette provides easy access to local amenities, cafes, and restaurants, making it an ideal spot for those who appreciate a street with a community feel.

The property features an open plan living and kitchen area, double bedroom and bathroom to the first floor. The second floor offers a large bright bedroom with ensuite bathroom.

Don't miss the opportunity to make this lovely property your own - Please call to view!
Lease term: 999 years. Service Charge: £0.

First Floor -

Living / Kitchen - 4.67 x 2.79 (15'3" x 9'1") -

Bedroom Two - 3.29 x 4.49 (10'9" x 14'8") -

Bathroom - 1.68 x 2.42 (5'6" x 7'11") -

Second Floor -

Bedroom One - 5.26 x 4.38 (17'3" x 14'4") -

Ensuite - 1.29 x 1.83 (4'2" x 6'0") -
title: 2 bedroom maisonette for sale in Hotel California
subtitle: 2 bedroom maisonette
